name: part_003
file: tmp_【#ちょこ先生誕2021】ちょこ先生の3Dお誕生日会【ホロライブ⧸癒月ちょこ】 [p9k8A3XzH68]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: Choco reveals the answer to the second question of the gesture game, and Subaru complains about its extreme difficulty.
Choco acts out the third question. Subaru correctly guesses 'Jet Coaster' but mocks Choco's acting style.
Choco acts out the fourth question. After many wrong guesses, Subaru finally lands on 'Duck' and complains about the delayed confirmation.
Choco prepares the audience and Subaru for the final question of the gesture game.

subtitles.original: 途中までは合ってたのに。
subtitles.english: It was correct up until the middle part.

subtitles.original: え、途中まで合ってるの？
subtitles.english: Eh, it was correct up until the middle?

subtitles.original: 途中までは合ってたのに。
subtitles.english: It was correct up until the middle part.

subtitles.original: え、じゃあトイレに行きたいが合ってるの？
subtitles.english: Eh, so the "wanting to go to the toilet" part was right?

subtitles.original: ちゃうちゃう。トイレ行きたいんじゃない。
subtitles.english: No, no. I wasn't trying to say I want to go to the toilet.

subtitles.original: 正解は言ってたんだよ。
subtitles.english: I already said the correct answer.

subtitles.original: え？
subtitles.english: Eh?

subtitles.original: 正解は、ナルシストのぶりっ子でした。
subtitles.english: The answer was "Narcissistic girl who acts cute".

subtitles.original: 答え ナルシストのぶりっ子
subtitles.english: Answer: Narcissistic girl who acts cute

subtitles.original: 残りの3問、正解しないと食べられなくなっちゃう。
subtitles.english: If you don't get the remaining three right, you won't be able to eat.

subtitles.original: 分かるわけねーだろ！これふんわりしすぎだろ！分かるわけねーだろ！
subtitles.english: There's no way I'd know! This is too vague! There's no way I'd know!

subtitles.original: お前そんなデスゲームでいいのかよ！お前はデスゲーマーの風上にも置けねえやつだ！
subtitles.english: Is that kind of death game okay with you?! You're a disgrace to death gamers!

subtitles.original: 分かった分かった。
subtitles.english: Okay, okay.

subtitles.original: でも、残り3問は、分かりやすくしてあげるよ。しょうがないな。
subtitles.english: But for the remaining three questions, I'll make them easier. Can't be helped.

subtitles.original: えーやったー！やったねやったね！
subtitles.english: Eh, yay! We did it, we did it!

subtitles.original: それでは3問目。
subtitles.english: Now for the third question.

subtitles.original: あ、ちょこ先生どうした？
subtitles.english: Ah, what's wrong, Choco-sensei?

subtitles.original: 待って。私3問目どっちでしたっけ。確かこっち。
subtitles.english: Wait. Which one was the third question? Pretty sure it was this one.

subtitles.original: ねえ、しっかりしてちょこ先生！
subtitles.english: Hey, get it together, Choco-sensei!

subtitles.original: ジェットコースター！ジェットコースター！
subtitles.english: Jet coaster! Jet coaster!

subtitles.original: いや、待て、これが...
subtitles.english: No, wait, this is...

subtitles.original: 正解！
subtitles.english: Correct!

subtitles.original: きたきたきたきた！
subtitles.english: Here it comes, here it comes!

subtitles.original: 正解はジェットコースターでしたー！
subtitles.english: The answer was "Jet coaster"!

subtitles.original: 答え ジェットコースター
subtitles.english: Answer: Jet coaster

subtitles.original: マジでね、登山家とで迷ったんだよ。
subtitles.english: Seriously, I was torn between that and a mountain climber.

subtitles.original: 登山してるおばあちゃんと迷ったんだよ、お前。
subtitles.english: I was torn with an old lady climbing a mountain.

subtitles.original: 最初重いリュック背負ってただろ！おむすびころりんの動きだっただろそれ！
subtitles.english: At first you were carrying a heavy backpack, right?! That was the movement from "Omusubi Kororin"!

subtitles.original: どう見てもアクトが下手すぎるだろマジで！
subtitles.english: No matter how you look at it, your acting is too bad, seriously!

subtitles.original: お前、穴にむすび落としてんじゃねーよ！
subtitles.english: Don't drop the rice ball into the hole!

subtitles.original: 何よ！落としたんスバルじゃねーわ！お前だわどちらかと言うと。
subtitles.english: What?! It's not like I dropped it, Subaru! If anything, it was you.

subtitles.original: 続いて第4問目。
subtitles.english: Moving on to the fourth question.

subtitles.original: ピヨピヨピヨピヨ...
subtitles.english: Piyo piyo piyo piyo...

subtitles.original: おっと、何かがある。
subtitles.english: Oh, something's happening.

subtitles.original: うわっ、足が！足が！足がやられた！
subtitles.english: Whoa, my leg! My leg! My leg is hurt!

subtitles.original: もう僕のことは置いていってほしいピヨ。
subtitles.english: I want you to leave me behind, piyo.

subtitles.original: ピヨ！何これ？
subtitles.english: Piyo! What is this?

subtitles.original: 飛べない、飛べない。飛べない鳥はただの鳥。
subtitles.english: Can't fly, can't fly. A bird that can't fly is just a bird.

subtitles.original: アヒル、アヒル、アヒル！ニワトリ！
subtitles.english: Duck, duck, duck! Chicken!

subtitles.original: ピヨ、ピヨ、ピヨ、ピヨ...
subtitles.english: Piyo, piyo, piyo, piyo...

subtitles.original: ペンギン！ペンギン！
subtitles.english: Penguin! Penguin!

subtitles.original: 息が絶え絶え、何それ？ダチョウ、ダチョウ！
subtitles.english: Out of breath, what's that? Ostrich, ostrich!

subtitles.original: ダチョウじゃない。
subtitles.english: It's not an ostrich.

subtitles.original: え、何何？行進？
subtitles.english: Eh, what what? Marching?

subtitles.original: ヒントヒントヒント！
subtitles.english: Hint hint hint!

subtitles.original: ひよこ、ひよこ、ニワトリ！どうだ！歩いているひよこ、ニワトリ、アヒル！
subtitles.english: Chick, chick, chicken! How's that! A walking chick, chicken, duck!

subtitles.original: それでは、正解をどうぞ。
subtitles.english: Well then, please give the answer.

subtitles.original: 正解は、アヒルでしたー！
subtitles.english: The answer was "Duck"!

subtitles.original: 答え アヒル
subtitles.english: Answer: Duck

subtitles.original: よっしゃー！私正解してんのに何でお前ピンポン鳴らさねえんだよと思ってたよ！
subtitles.english: Yesss! I was thinking "I got it right, why didn't you sound the buzzer!"!

subtitles.original: ジャッジ甘いぞこれ！ジャッジ！お前あとで概要欄名前変えとけよマジで！
subtitles.english: The judging is weak! Judge! You seriously change your name in the description later!

subtitles.original: やっぱりスバルじゃねーか。
subtitles.english: It was Subaru after all.

subtitles.original: じゃあ最後の問題に参りましょうか。
subtitles.english: Well then, shall we move on to the last question?

subtitles.original: それでは、最後の問題でございます。
subtitles.english: Now then, for the final question.
